name: eggjs-backend
description: 基于 eggjs 的node后端框架

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev-back" "cd front && yarn start"
scripts.build-front: cd front && BUILD_PATH=../app/public PUBLIC_URL=/public yarn build
scripts.ins: npm i --production --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org && cd front && yarn --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
scripts.pull: git fetch --all && git reset --hard origin/master && git pull
scripts.deploy: npm run pull && npm run ins && npm run build-front && npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run lint -- --fix && npm run test-local

author: zkboys
